profile.title: Umwirondoro w’Ukoresha
profile.mustLogin: Ugomba kwinjira (login) kugira ngo ubone ibi igenamiterere.
profile.noPrivateKey: Nta urufunguzo rw’ibanga rubitse kuri iki gikoresho rwo koherezwa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Shyiraho ijambobanga ryo kurinda kopi y’ububiko:
profile.enterBackupPassword: Injiza ijambobanga rya iyi kopi y’ububiko:
profile.importSuccess: Urufunguzo rw’ibanga rwashyizwe kuri iki gikoresho.
profile.importFailed: Kwinjiza byanze (ijambobanga si ryo cyangwa dosiye yangiritse).
profile.keysRotated: Urufunguzo rushya rwakorewe kandi urwo ku mugaragaro rwoherejwe.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Urufunguzo rwawe rw’ibanga ntiruva kuri iki gikoresho. Ohereza kopi yarwo ifite ijambobanga kugira ngo urusubize ku kindi gikoresho.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Uri kuri Free—koresha amahitamo yihuse ya Izuba/Ukwezi hepfo. Kuzamura urwego bigufungurira insanganyamatsiko (themes) nyinshi.
profile.backupDesc: Kora kopi z’icyihishe z’ufunguzo rwawe, kandi uzisubize ku kindi gikoresho kugira ngo uhuze.
profile.followHint: Inkuru ze zizagaragara kuri ‘Urimo gukurikira’ niba yanditse ku Bakurikiye (cyangwa ku By’um公开).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Ohereza amafoni n’ubutumwa byinjira kuri telefoni cyangwa imeri byemejwe. Ubutumwa/amagambo usohora bishobora kugaragaza nimero yawe ya Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Hitamo ubutumwa cyangwa icyumba cyo kuganiramo kugira ngo utangire

status.captionLabel: Ni iki kiri mu bitekerezo byawe?

auth.headline: Ubutumwa bwizewe, ku isi hose, buhindurwa ako kanya
auth.description: Uburyo bwo guhisha buhereye ku mpera kugera ku mpera, ubusobanuro buhindurwa na AI, ubutumwa bwisiba, n’amajwi/video.

feature.privacy: Iby’ubuzima bwegereye umuntu imbere: Iby’uwikoresha, ugenzura wowe ubwawe.

auth.desktopTip: Ku mashini? Skena ukoreshe telefoni yawe kugira ngo ubone porogaramu.
auth.subhead: Ubutumwa bwa bumenyi bwihishe, bwite, kandi buhindurwa—ako kanya.
auth.tip: Ushobora gukoresha Chatforia kuri buri gikoresho—cyangwa ukamanura porogaramu ku bw’imikorere myiza.
auth.scanHint: Skena kugira ngo ukure porogaramu cyangwa ufungure mu mucukumbuzi.

press.title: Itangazamakuru
press.contactText: Kubaza bijyanye n’itangazamakuru, twandikire kuri press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ni ubutumwa bwizewe bufite ihindurangero ako kanya n’ubuhishwa bwa E2E, bugamije koroshya ibiganiro by’isi yose mu buryo bwite kandi budasomwa n’undi.
press.assetsText: Logos, amashusho ya ecran, n’amafoto y’umusaruro (biraboneka vuba).

careers.title: Akazi
careers.intro: Turi itsinda rito riri kubaka ubutumwa bwite, mpuzamahanga. Niba wita ku buhishwa, uburyo bworoshye gukoresha, no kuri UX nziza, turakwishimira kukumva.
careers.openRoles: Inyigisho za injeniyeri (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Ibicuruzwa, Ubufasha.

about.title: Ibyerekeye Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ni ubutumwa bwizewe, burimo indimi nyinshi, bufite ubuhishwa buhereye ku mpera kugera ku mpera, ihindurangero ako kanya, n’amajwi/video. Intego yacu: gufasha abantu guhuzwa—mu mutekano, mu ibanga, kandi mu ndimi zitandukanye.

values.privacy: Ibanga ku isonga: E2E ku buryo busanzwe.
values.control: Igenzura: Ubutumwa bwisiba & ibimenyetso byo gusoma ni amahitamo.

about.howDescription: Ubutumwa buhishurwa ku gikoresho cyawe mbere yo kugenda. Ihindurangero, ububiko, no guhuza ibikoresho bitegurwa ku buryo seriveri zacu zibona amakuru make cyane.

advertise.title: Yamamaza kuri Chatforia
advertise.description: Gerayo ku bakoresha ubutumwa bafite uruhare, ukoreshe imyanya izwi neza kandi yubaha ikiranga. Dutanga za bannières ahagaragara, ubufatanye, n’amamaza ya nyirurubuga. Abanyamuryango ba Premium ntibabona amamaza.

adsense.withPubId: Ubu dukoresha Google AdSense. Niba wifuza kutugeraho ukoreshe Google Ads, koresha ID ya publisher {{pubId}} kandi usabe gushyirwa ku miyanya iri hepfo. Hari n’ubufatanye butaziguye—koresha ifishi.
adsense.noPubId: Ubu dukoresha Google AdSense. Hari n’ubufatanye butaziguye—koresha ifishi iri hepfo.

advertise.noPlacements: Nta myanya irashyirwaho. Yongerwe muri ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Uko gusubiramo kenshi no kuguma igihe kirekire muri UI yo kuganira
why.brandSafe: Imiterere yubahiriza ikiranga; gufata ku rugero gukwiye
why.deals: Amasezerano ataziguye cyangwa anyura muri AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Urakoze! Ubutumwa bwawe bwoherejwe. Tuzagusubiza vuba.
form.mailtoInfo: Gufungura porogaramu ya imeri yawe kugira ngo wohereze ubusabe…

upgrade.title: Hindura urwego
upgrade.subtitle: Hitamo paketi igukwiye: kuramo amamaza kuri Plus, cyangwa ubone ibikorwa byose bya Premium.

features.msg: Ubutumwa hagati y’abantu babiri no mu matsinda
Ubutumwa hagati y’abantu babiri no mu matsinda

gettingStarted.title: Gutangira
gettingStarted.subtitle: Uri mushya kuri Chatforia? Aya ni amasomo magufi akwereka ib’ingenzi kugira ngo utangire mu minota mike.

alert.text: Uyu muyoboro uzagurwa uko dushyiraho ibintu bishya. Niba hari ibibura, tubarize binyuze kuri

section2.title: 2) Tangira ubutumwa
section2.item1: Kora DM cyangwa Itsinda maze wohereze ubutumwa bwa mbere.
section2.item2: Koresha ihindurangero ako kanya kugira ngo muganire mu ndimi 100+.
section2.item3: Gerageza ubutumwa bwisiba n’ibimenyetso byo gusoma muri Umwirondoro → Ibanga.

section3.title: 3) Genda kure
section3.item1Part1: Tunganya paketi yawe kuri paji ya
section3.item2Part1: Huza ibindi bikoresho kandi ushyireho kopi z’icyihishe muri

account.a: Kura porogaramu cyangwa ukoreshe web, kanda “Fungura konti”, wemeze imeri/telefoni. Kugira ngo usubize, kanda “Wibagiwe ijambobanga”.

privacy.q: Ese ubutumwa burinzwe buhereye ku mpera kugera ku mpera?
privacy.a: Yego. Ubutumwa n’amatele birinzwe (E2E) ku buryo busanzwe. Wowe n’uwo woherejeho ni mwe mubisoma.

translate.a: Shoboza “Ihindurangero ryikora” muri Igenamiterere → Imigaragarire & Ururimi. Aho bishoboka dukorera ku gikoresho; ahandi dukoresha API zizewe n’amakuru make ashoboka.

contact.a: Twandikire kuri support@chatforia.com. Shyiraho amashusho na verisiyo ya porogaramu yawe.

intro.body: Iyi Politiki y’Ibanga isobanura uko Chatforia (“twe”) dukusanya, dukoresha, kandi dusangira amakuru iyo ukoresha porogaramu n’serivisi zacu. Dutegura Chatforia ku buryo butuma tubona amakuru make ashoboka.

infoWeCollect.title: Amakuru dukusanya
infoWeCollect.account: Amakuru ya konti (nko imeri/telefoni) yo gufungura no kurinda konti yawe.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Ibyo gusesengura/ikoreshwa nko raporo z’impanuka, ubwoko bw’igikoresho, cyangwa isesengura ryoroheje yo kunoza imikorere.

howWeUse.title: Uko dukoresha amakuru
howWeUse.provide: Gutanga no kurinda serivisi (kwemeza, kurwanya spam/ubugizi bwa nabi).

sharing.title: Gusangira
sharing.body: Ntiducuruza amakuru y’umuntu ku giti cye. Dushobora gusangira makeya n’abadutangira serivisi (nko kwitaba no gusesengura) ku masezerano akomeye.

rights.title: Uburenganzira bwawe
rights.body: Bitewe n’akarere (urugero, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ushobora gusaba kureba, gukosora, gusiba, cyangwa kwanga bimwe mu ikoreshwa. Twandikire: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kubika & umutekano
retention.body: Tubika gusa iby’ingenzi ku mikorere ya serivisi kandi dushyira mu bikorwa umutekano usanzwe. Ibirimo bya E2E ntitubishobora gusoma.

children.title: Abana
children.body: Chatforia ntiyagenewe abana bari munsi ya 13 (cyangwa nk’uko amategeko y’iwanyu abiteganya).

changes.title: Impinduka
changes.body: Tuzashyira hano ibivuguruye kandi duhindure itariki ya “Byavuguruwe bwa nyuma”.

intro.body: Mu gukoresha Chatforia wemera aya Mategeko. Niba utayemera, ntukoreshe serivisi.

accounts.title: Konti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Tanga amakuru nyayo kandi urinde amajambobanga.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Uraryozwa ibikorwa bikorerwa kuri konti yawe.

acceptableUse.title: Ukoresha kwekwiriye
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ntukoreshe ibitemewe, ihohotera, cyangwa ibica uburenganzira; ntukoreshe spam cyangwa ikoreshwa ryikora ribi.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Dushobora guhagarika/guhagarika burundu ku byarenze ku mategeko.

yourContent.title: Ibirimo byawe
yourContent.body: Ufite uburenganzira ku birimo byawe. Uduha uburenganzira bukenewe bwo gutwara serivisi (nk’itambukiranya, kubika, ihindurangero).

disclaimer.title: Inyandikomvugo & Uburenganzira
disclaimer.body: Serivisi itangwa “uko iri” nta birengera bihari. Ku rwego rurenzeho rwemerewe n’amategeko, Chatforia ntishobora kubazwa ibyangiritse bitaziguye cyangwa bikurikiraho.

changes.title: Impinduka
changes.body: Tushobora kuvugurura aya mategeko; gukomeza gukoresha nyuma y’impinduka bivuze kubyemera.

doNotSell.title: Ntucuruze cyangwa gusangira Amakuru Yanjye bwite
doNotSell.body: Chatforia nticururiza amakuru y’umuntu ku giti cye. Ariko, abatuye California barashobora gutanga ubusabe hakurikijwe CPRA bakoresheje buto iri hepfo.

cookies.title: Igenamiterere rya Cookies
cookies.body: Chatforia ikoresha cookies nke (nko iz’isession, umutekano). Ntidukoresha cookies z’amamaza z’abandi. Tunga cookies ukoresheje igenamiterere rya mushakisha wawe.
